twoSetSkill.name: Hanabi Fest 2 Pieces
twoSetSkill.description: Upon using weapon active skill, surrounding enemies take 100% ATK of Physical DMG and 100% ATK of Fire DMG every 0.5s for 6s. Triggering this again resets the duration.

threeSetSkill.name: XXXL Firecrackers 3 Pieces
threeSetSkill.description: Gain 10% Crit Rate and 60% Crit DMG to self.
